attributes.additional_details:
Great Britain, Back in our prime, we were a Nation.. Not some pushover country like we are today.. Today we're being told.. what we can, and what we cannot do, By EU Law.. We currently Owe billions upon billions, and nothing we can do, under this EU law will change that.

We don't need the EU Telling us what we can do any more.. We was promised a Referendum.. We have still yet to see this promise come to light.

Give out a fair Referendum with the backing of this partition and you will see.. That we don't want this any more.. What is the point of a Government within a Government In that case, this E-Partition should go to Germany as they now Lead us..?
